title: What should a person be to get success, aspired or inspired? - Quora

response.answer_text: Success is a by-product of your will and strength. If you have the strength to spread your chest, even when you fail in the mission, and a will to make it your life, then success will simply happen. Even if it doesn't, you are still fine.!
Be open to all three Willing to change Have strong inclination to be inspired motivated
